title: El Yemen Valley, Arabia: Rock Wall with the Upper Part Resembling a Row of Columns
medium:
Recto: Graphite on gray paper
Verso: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of a rock wall, the upper part of which looks  like a row of columns with a hillside visible in the right middleground.

Verso: Horizontal view of the left part of a representation of the valley as a distant view.
name: Drawing
